column1: Have a suggestion? Please feel free to send us any ideas!
column2: If your question is not answered here and you would like to suggest it then pleasecontact us by filling the “Contact Us” form using the “Contact” link available in the footer of our site. Let us know your problem and we will try to fix it as soon as possible!

column1: What are cookies? How are they used on this site?
column2: Cookies are small pieces of information that are stored by your browser on your computer’s hard drive. They contain no recognisable Personal Information of your. We use them to identify you as you travel around our site and to provide site usage information, which will further help us improve and develop the site and services we offer. We advise you not to use cookies if your computer is shared by other people. You can accept all cookies, reject all cookies, or modify your browser to alert you of any new cookies. Cookies also protect the integrity of registered passwords and limit access to 'paid for' services.

column1: Are credit / debit card transactions safe on your site?
column2: At our site, the security of your transactions and personal information is our priority. Because Internet security is so important to us and our customers, we do not hold any of your credit / debit card details anywhere on our website. They are simply passed securely to our payments processor for authorisation by your bank. We will never ask for your site account password or your bank account details by email. We will never ask for your credit / debit card four-digit security PIN under any circumstances.

column1: What Payment methods do you accept?
column2: We accept payment using the following credit or debit cards: VISA, VISA Delta, VISA Electron, MasterCard, Maestro and Solo.We also accept payment through Paypal. Important information: For your security and to avoid any fraudulent transactions, your billing name and address must match that of the credit card used for payment. We reserve the right to cancel any order that does not match these criteria.

column1: What should I do if I haven’t received all the items I ordered?
column2: Please check your order as soon as you receive it. All the items in the box should match the items listed on the despatch note. If there is an item missing, please contact us by filling the “Contact Us” form using the “Contact” link available in the footer of our site. Please quote your order number.

column1: What do I do if my order does not arrive?
column2:
We always try to ensure that your goods are delivered on time however, sometimes it is delayed by factors beyond our control.
If you require any assistance please contact us by filling the “Contact Us” form using the “Contact” link available in the footer of our site.

Your orders or parts of an order can be cancelled by our system for various reasons. Some reasons are:
- Item(s) not available;
- Difficulty in processing payment information;
- Cannot deliver to address provided; or
- Duplicate order was placed

If your order is cancelled, please contact our customer services team with your order number by filling the “Contact Us” form using the “Contact” link available in the footer of our site.

column1: Can I view all my previous orders?
column2: Yes, under “My Store Account” section of your Store navigation click on “My Orders”. Here you can view the order number, date raised, and the delivery address, total of the order, the status. On clicking “View Order” you can see a full summary of the specific order selected and you can also print your order from this screen. You can also reorder any order by clicking on “Reorder” link.

column1: I am having problem entering promotional codes?
column2: If you are unsure on how to implement any discount codes or do not understand any promotional offers, please do not hesitate to contact us by filling the “Contact Us” form using the “Contact” link available in the footer of our site. Let us know your problem and we will try to fix it as soon as possible.

column1: How do I place an order?
column2: Placing an order on our website is easy. Once you have found the item, click “Add to Cart” – and your item will then be added to your “Cart”. You can find “My Cart” in the Store navigation, and “Checkout” link in the top-most header navigation menu. Once you have finished shopping, just click on “Proceed to Checkout” in cart to checkout.

column1: Do you use the personal information that I supply?
column2:
We will treat all your Personal Information as confidential (although we reserve the right to disclose it in the circumstances set out below). We will keep it on a secure server and we will fully comply with all applicable Data Protection and consumer legislation from time to time in place.

We use your information only for the following purposes:

- Processing your orders, including despatch, payment and returns;
- To prevent or detect fraud or abuses of our website;
- To enable third parties to carry out technical, logistical or other functions on our behalf;
- For statistical or survey purposes to personalise and improve this website and its services to you;
- To serve website content and advertisements to you;
- To administer this website;
- If you give consent, to notify you of products or special offers that may be of interest to you.

column1: How do I remove something from my Cart?
column2: The Cart is editable. In your cart, you can click on the remove icon to remove an item, or change the quantity and click on “Update Shopping Cart” button.

column1: How do I see what I’ve placed in my Cart?
column2: To see what is currently in your Cart simply click on “My Cart” available in the Store navigation and your cart contents will be shown.

column1: How do I create my Wish List?
column2: When you are viewing a product, you can add the product to your Wish List by clicking the “Add to Wishlist” link. You can view and manage your Wish List in the “My Store Account” section available under the Store navigation. Wishlist can be forwarded to your family and friends via e-mail.

column1: How do I create my address book?
column2: The Address Book function is only available once you have signed in to your account. Then you will be able to click on “Address Book” on the left hand side under “My Store Account” to see your current addresses. You can edit the saved billing or shipping addresses or click on “Add New Address” to add new addresses to your account.

column1: How do I find the products I am looking for?
column2: There are a number of ways to find the products you are looking for. You can use the search box in the right hand corner of Store pages. There are various other filters available in this Store to narrow your search. You can also find products belonging to a specific category. You can use the product category based navigation in the top part of Store to browse through products.

column1: How do I create my online account?
column2:
You can create your online account from any page on the shopping website by clicking onto the Sign in / Register link on the top right corner of your screen. You will be asked to enter your personal details including your name, email address and password. Once you have created your online account this will enable you to: Proceed through checkout faster when making a purchase; view past orders; add items to your wishlist; make changes to your account information; add alternative addresses for shipping to multiple family members and friends; and do a lot more.
The "Checkout" link will only appear in the top menu bar once you have signed in on future visits to the Website.

column1: Why do I need to register to shop from your site?
column2: Creating an account allows you to store your shipment details for future purchases. Also, all members are given the option to receive information on the latest trends, offers and discounts - we love spoiling our Members! You can subscribe to our newsletter.
